tasks.instruction:
Fix the following issues on the TAWIN website:

1. Services Section: Implement exactly three boxes that enlarge on hover/click with the exact content provided:
   - First box: "Strategic Team Augmentation and Technology Consulting" with all the specified details
   - Second box: "Cloud Journey, Digital Technology Transformation and Online IT e-Commerce" with all the specified details
   - Third box: "Business Transformation and Program Management" with all the specified details
   
2. Timeline Issue: Remove or update the company timeline to address that it was only created in 2024 (ideation process)

3. Visual Enhancement: Make the services section more aesthetic, luxurious and prestigious with proper animations

Ensure these specific requirements are implemented exactly as requested.
